name: Transactions Following Report
query:
SELECT
`tabTransaction`.name as "Transaction :Link/Transaction:170",
`tabTransaction`.transaction_number as "Transaction No.::125",
`tabTransaction`.workflow_state as "Workflow State::140",
`tabTransaction`.transaction_name as "Transaction Name::200",
`tabTransaction`.transaction_owner_name as "Transaction Owner Name::180",
`tabTransaction`.transaction_type as "Transaction Type::200",
`tabTransaction`.current_situation as "Current Situation::200",
`tabTransaction`.general_remarks as "General Remarks::200"

FROM
`tabTransaction`

WHERE

 `tabTransaction`.posting_date between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s

ORDER BY `tabTransaction`.name desc
